label: Usecase
name: Crowd Gathering Detection

modelDetails.description: Detects crowd formation events that exceed predefined thresholds with configurable alert management
modelDetails.intended_use: Monitor crowd density and prevent overcrowding in public spaces, retail, and transportation hubs
limitations: Accuracy decreases in extremely dense crowds
modelDetails.ethical_considerations: Ensure crowd monitoring respects privacy and does not target specific groups

parameters.computational_complexity: O(n) where n=detected objects per frame

countThreshold.description: Raise alerts if the object count exceeds the specified countThreshold

ViolationFrameCount.description: If the count threshold exceeds for at least this many frames

alert_interval.description: To alert every first and at every alert_interval if the object continues to exist, to avoid continuously throwing alerts

severity.description: Severity of the alerts, where 'low' indicates minimal impact or urgency, 'medium' indicates moderate impact requiring attention, and 'high' indicates critical impact requiring immediate action

throughput.counting_accuracy: Â±5% for crowds up to 50 people

notes: Effective for crowd management and safety compliance. ViolationFrameCount prevents false alarms from brief count spikes.
